thread.title: Jaco Visagie Injury Blow For Blue Bulls
thread.title_full: Jaco Visagie Injury Blow For Blue Bulls

author: @TheSportsEagle
title: Jaco Visagie Injury Blow For Blue Bulls
text: @TheSportsEagle 0 Comment Blue Bulls Blue Bulls hooker Jaco Visagie has been ruled out for the remainder of the Absa Currie Cup season with an ankle injury. Visagie picked up the injury against the Sharks in Durban two weeks ago. He suffered ligament damage and has been ruled out for the rest of the year. The long term injury list has three new faces from last week. Visagie (ankle, three/four months), Jannes Kirsten (ankle, three months) and Roelof Smit (wrist, four months) have joined the regulars in Irne Herbst (knee), Piet Van Zyl (knee), Hanru Liebenberg (small bowel rupture, twelve weeks), Callie Visagie (foot, three months), Morn√© Mellett (neck, four months), Dennis Visser (ankle, three weeks), Nic Ee Jager (ankle, two months) and Entienne Swanepoel (back, two weeks). The Bulls team to face the Pumas on Friday will be announced on Wednesday .
